agents.last_line: [2026-03-01T04:09:45Z] [research-agent] Completed Spring 2026 Anime Season Preview (19KB, d176ede9). Selected anime topic to balance 5 tech reports already completed today. Covered: Tier S (Classroom of the Elite S4 ‚Äî Lerche, Apr 1, 90-min 4-ep special, Eir Aoi OP; Witch Hat Atelier ‚Äî Bug Films, Apr 6, Kamome Shirahama magic-as-craft, Crunchyroll Anime Nights March 16 preview; Daemons of the Shadow Realm ‚Äî Bones Film, Hiromu Arakawa, Apr 4, 2-cour, dir:Masahiro Ando, music:Kenichiro Suehiro; Re:Zero S4 ‚Äî White Fox, Arc 6 Pleiades Watchtower, return-by-death origin revealed, psychologically darkest arc; One Piece Elbaph ‚Äî Toei, 20yr fan wait; MHA Vigilantes ‚Äî Bones Film complete manga); Tier A (Kaiju No. 8 S2; Blue Lock S3 Neo Egoist League Disney+; Tensei Slime S4 Apr 3 five split-cours; Fire Force S3 David Production finale); Tier B (Dr. Stone SF Part 3 TMS finale; Drops of God S2); Ghost in the Shell Science SARU corrected to July 2026 Summer not Spring; Crunchyroll Anime Nights 2026 March 16 theatrical preview (US/Canada); streaming platform breakdown; season context: COVID-era backlog clearing + multiple franchise climax arcs coinciding = densest season since Fall 2023. 225 total reports. 6 reports today Mar 1.

agents.name: content-agent
agents.last_line: [2026-03-01T04:04:04Z] [content-agent] Generated AI Hardware 2026 tech writeup (7.8KB, 28023f38). Gap identified: research report #224 (AI Hardware/Chips, 24KB) had no content piece. Structured as '4 things that actually matter': (1) Blackwell economics ‚Äî $5M rack‚Üí$75M token revenue (15x ROI), NVDA Q4 $194B annual data center +68%/13x since ChatGPT, $435B hyperscaler capex justified by spreadsheet math, scarcity era over; (2) Vera Rubin 10x inference cost drop ‚Äî H2 2026, R100 336B transistors/HBM4 22TB/s/50PFLOPS FP4/Vera CPU 88-core ARM, makes agentic multi-step AI economically viable at consumer scale, annual cadence Blackwell‚ÜíRubin‚ÜíFeynman; (3) AMD duopoly with catch ‚Äî MI355X 288GB HBM3e/8TB/s parity, OpenAI 6GW validation deal, ROCm 7.0 CUDA parity; wins cost-sensitive inference, loses frontier training custom kernels; MI400/Helios HBM4 late-2026; (4) CoWoS as real chokepoint ‚Äî 35K‚Üí130K wafers/month, dual CoWoS+HBM4 bottleneck, AP7 Chiayi execution risk, TSMC $56B +37% capex, $1T semiconductor market 2026. 224 research reports total. 5 content pieces Mar 1.

[Sun 2026-03-01 03:22 UTC] show the digest in the chat in the future

The delivery code is there but it truncates to 3800 chars and sends as one big message. Telegram has a 4096 char limit but 65 videos is way too long for one message ‚Äî better to send it as a file or split it. Let me fix it to send the full digest as a **file attachment** instead:

The current approach sends it via `openclaw agent --deliver` which routes through the main session ‚Äî but the actual channel send should use the `message` tool directly. The cleanest fix: send a **short summary** to Telegram + the full digest saved to file (already done). Let me update the script to send a nicely formatted short summary with top highlights instead of the truncated wall of text:
Now test the message formatting with the existing digest file:

[Sun 2026-03-01 04:11 UTC] so what's next?

ok here's the honest state of things desu~ (^^)

---

**üêõ One known broken thing:**
**agni-cycle.sh** ‚Äî the spawn command is wrong. It uses `openclaw agent --session-id rudra-xxx --message "..."` but that tries to send to an *existing* session by ID, not spawn a new one. Rudra never actually runs. Fix = use `sessions_spawn` tool (but that's only available inside an agent turn, not from bash CLI). Easiest fix: just call `rudra-executor.sh` directly in the cron instead of going through agni's spawn dance.

---

**üí° Other things that could be fun/useful:**
1. **Fix agni ‚Üí just wire agni cron to call rudra-executor directly** (quick fix, ~10 min)
2. **ClawDash: Research tab** ‚Äî you have a ton of research reports in `reports/`, could be a nice tab to browse them
3. **ClawDash: better mobile nav** ‚Äî tab bar could use icons not just text
4. **Disk cleanup** ‚Äî 81% used, `downloads/` has 9.7GB worth of stuff
5. **New feature: daily summary pushed to Telegram** ‚Äî morning briefing (weather, disk, cron health, what happened overnight)
6. **Something totally new** ‚Äî you tell me nya~

what sounds good? ‚ô™

[Sun 2026-03-01 04:26 UTC] nice. what else can web build? (outside of this web)

here's the honest braindump nyaa~ (^^) based on what I know about you + what we have running:

---

**üéÆ Games / Fun**
- **OpenClaw Idle RPG** ‚Äî was scaffolded in `apps/openclaw-idle-rpg/` but never really finished. Agents as units, tokens as currency, crises/boons. Could actually be fun to polish and deploy locally
- **Anime tracker** ‚Äî personal watchlist app, pulls from Jikan/MAL, track watch status, ratings, notes. You watch a lot so this could be legit useful

**üõ† Actually Useful Tools**
- **Torrent manager UI** ‚Äî right now you use aria2 CLI/Telegram. Could build a proper web UI (search Nyaa, add magnet, track progress, auto-delete after download) ‚Äî separate from ClawDash
- **115 transfer tool** ‚Äî integrate 115 cloud upload into a proper web UI so you can queue transfers with status
- **Obsidian publish helper** ‚Äî since research syncs to Obsidian, could build a quick tool to pick reports and format them nicely for publishing/sharing
- **Personal finance tracker** ‚Äî simple income/expense tracker, local SQLite, no cloud

**ü§ñ Agent / Infrastructure**
- **Better Agni** ‚Äî right now agni's "opportunities" are all false positives (scanning its own logs). Could make it genuinely useful ‚Äî scan for stale cron jobs, detect agents that haven't run in >48h, auto-fix broken scripts
- **Telegram bot commands** ‚Äî `/downloads`, `/disk`, `/digest` already work via slash handler ‚Äî could add more: `/top` (top token spenders), `/weather`, `/remind 30m do thing`

**üåê Actually New**
- **Personal start page** ‚Äî browser new-tab page, shows weather Bangkok, upcoming calendar, latest YouTube digest, disk status. Fast + local
- **Manga/doujin catalog** ‚Äî since you download stuff, a local catalog with cover thumbnails, tags, search. Like Kavita/Komga but custom

---

what sounds interesting? or is there something specific you've been wanting but don't have yet? ‚ô™
